DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety , tolerability effectiveness mucopolysaccharide polysulfate cream treatment superficial varicose vein
DOC.brief_title: Safety And Efficacy Study Of Topic Mucopolysaccharide Polysulfate Cream In The Superficial Varicose Veins Treatment
DOC.criteria: Patients must able understand study procedure , agree participate , give write consent . Patients must able follow study medication regimen . Patients inflammatory process superficial vein 72 hour . Presence symmetric lesion compare one side . Pregnancy risk pregnancy . Lactation . Use topical systemic antiinflammatory , antihistamine immunosuppressive drug within last 48 hour prior study Any alteration deep vein . History atopy allergic disease . History allergy component formulation . Other condition consider investigator reasonable noneligibility
